# Product Launch Orchestration

## Overview
From positioning to content packs, run launches across content, copy, social, email, and landing pagesâ€”measured in one place.

## When to Use
- You need a coordinated launch plan with asset packs
- You want measurement across all channels

## Trigger Phrases
- "launch plan" "launch content pack" "product launch"

## What it Contains
- Launch brief and narrative
- Asset checklist and channel plan
- Measurement handoff

## Workflow
1) Narrative and positioning (with Strategic Research toolkit)
2) Content pack:
- Blog (seo-workflow-orchestration)
- Landing page (landing-page-copy)
- Emails (email-campaign-automation)
- Social (social-campaign-orchestration)
- Ads (ad-copywriting)
3) Calendar and distribution
4) Measure: unified-analytics (launch report)
